constantValues: Collection of system users that routinely collaborate. Teams can be used to simplify record sharing and provide team members with common access to organization data when team members belong to different Business Units.

foreignKeyAttribute.name: id

constantValues: Unique identifier of the organization associated with the team.

foreignKeyAttribute.description: Unique identifier of the organization associated with the team.

foreignKeyAttribute.name: id

constantValues: Unique identifier of the business unit with which the team is associated.

foreignKeyAttribute.description: Unique identifier of the business unit with which the team is associated.

members.name: createdOn

constantValues: Date and time when the team was created.

members.description: Date and time when the team was created.

members.name: modifiedOn

constantValues: Date and time when the team was last modified.

members.description: Date and time when the team was last modified.

foreignKeyAttribute.name: createdBy

constantValues: Unique identifier of the user who created the team.

foreignKeyAttribute.description: Unique identifier of the user who created the team.

foreignKeyAttribute.name: modifiedBy

constantValues: Unique identifier of the user who last modified the team.

foreignKeyAttribute.description: Unique identifier of the user who last modified the team.

members.description: Unique identifier of the data import or data migration that created this record.

members.name: overriddenCreatedOn

constantValues: Date and time that the record was migrated.

members.description: Date and time that the record was migrated.

foreignKeyAttribute.name: id

constantValues: Unique identifier of the user primary responsible for the team.

foreignKeyAttribute.description: Unique identifier of the user primary responsible for the team.

members.name: isDefault

constantValues: Information about whether the team is a default business unit team.

members.description: Information about whether the team is a default business unit team.

members.description: Pronunciation of the full name of the team, written in phonetic hiragana or katakana characters.

constantValues: Unique identifier of the delegate user who created the team.

foreignKeyAttribute.description: Unique identifier of the delegate user who created the team.

foreignKeyAttribute.name: modifiedOnBehalfBy

constantValues: Unique identifier of the delegate user who last modified the team.

foreignKeyAttribute.description: Unique identifier of the delegate user who last modified the team.

foreignKeyAttribute.name: id

constantValues: Unique identifier of the default queue for the team.

foreignKeyAttribute.description: Unique identifier of the default queue for the team.

foreignKeyAttribute.name: id

constantValues: Unique identifier of the currency associated with the team.

foreignKeyAttribute.description: Unique identifier of the currency associated with the team.

members.name: exchangeRate

constantValues: Exchange rate for the currency associated with the team with respect to the base currency.

members.description: Exchange rate for the currency associated with the team with respect to the base currency.

constantValues: Shows the team template that is associated with the team.

definitions.description: Collection of system users that routinely collaborate. Teams can be used to simplify record sharing and provide team members with common access to organization data when team members belong to different Business Units.
